column4: Don't suppose anyone here plays Sauerbraten on 6.10 using an nVidia 5200?   hahaha pretty specific question...ha
Well if anyone does does it ever freeze up on you during multiplayer?
I played World of Warcraft in OpenGL mode on a 6800gs on 6.10.  But to your specific question, no.
the nv driver really isn't 3d accellerated.
